title: Monetary Policy: Normalization and the Road Ahead
content: For release on delivery  10:00 p.m. EST (7:00 p.m. PST)  March 8, 2019   Monetary Policy:  Normalization and the Road Ahead   Remarks by   Jerome H. Powell   Chair   Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System   at   2019 SIEPR Economic Summit   Stanford Institute of Economic Policy Research  Stanford, California   March 8, 2019
